record.dc:title: 3Ma31 Madison County, Alabama. Features #2 and #3, rectangluar structure patterns marked with string. The rod in foreground is 5 feet long.
record.dc:creator: H. Summerfield Day
record.wpa:narrative: Features #2 and #3, rectangluar structure patterns marked with string. The rod in foreground is 5 feet long.
record.wpa:comments: Originally, 1Ma31 was divided into a mound site and the underlying and surrounding village site. This photo is from the village site.
